talk.author: did:plc:ivj63werg3ooil6n6hbcb3ic
talk.utter: It is TRUE. The left always gets nasty when they are shown something they do not like. Who was in charge of the border under Obama? TOM HOMAN - same guy Trump picked - was appointed by President Barack Obama as Immigration and Customs director of ENFORCEMENT AND REMOVAL OPERATIONS in 2013.

talk.author: did:plc:hr46pti5p5abqr5jcw4fu5hd
talk.utter: Yes, Homan is the same guy. The issue being discussed is the policy of separation, which was Trump. Obama had children who came over without parents. Big difference. You calling people full of crap is nasty. Don't start none, won't be none.

talk.author: did:plc:hr46pti5p5abqr5jcw4fu5hd

Under the Obama administration, a “minuscule” number of children were removed from their parents but only in rare cases, such as a parent being arrested on a drug charge, former U.S. Customs and Border Patrol Protection commissioner Gil Kerlikowske said.
Yeah, totally different, huh?

But experts say

“This is not a ‘missing kids’ problem; it’s a ‘missing paperwork’ problem,” Jonathan Beier, associate director of research and evaluation for the Acacia Center for Justice’s Unaccompanied Children Program, wrote in an email.

talk.author: did:plc:ivj63werg3ooil6n6hbcb3ic
talk.utter: Bull. That is a disgusting egregious heinous statistic and you should be outraged and want to do everything possible to find these children some of whom are surely being abused. Put aside your political affinities and take a stand on this travesty.
